Response Description & Payload
------------------------------

.. table:: Table 4: AT Commands â€“ Response description and payload

   +-------------------------------------+---------------+----------------+
   | **Command**                         | **Response    | **Response     |
   |                                     | Description** | Payload**      |
   +=====================================+===============+================+
   | AT                                  | OK/Error      | NA             |
   +-------------------------------------+---------------+----------------+
   | AT+WDIS                             | OK/Error      | NA             |
   +-------------------------------------+---------------+----------------+
   | AT+WSCAN                            | OK/Error      | NA             |
   +-------------------------------------+---------------+----------------+
   | AT+SOCSRV                           | OK            | 0:CONNECT      |
   |                                     |               | :0>>@:OK       |
   | Example: at+socsrv=0,1,1,9000       |               |                |
   +-------------------------------------+---------------+----------------+
   | AT+HCSTART                          | OK            | :C             |
   |                                     |               | ONNECT:0>>@:OK |
   | Example: at+hcstart=192.168.1.5,80  |               |                |
   +-------------------------------------+---------------+----------------+

Running the Application 
------------------------

For more details regarding running the AT Commands application, refer:
Run the Application in the QSG.
